original_text: When you speak to people, always speak kind words. Say things that will help them. Then, when someone asks you a question, you will know how to reply.
korean_text: 너희 말을 항상 은혜 가운데서 소금으로 맛을 냄과 같이 하라 그리하면 각 사람에게 마땅히 대답할 것을 알리라

sentences.original_text: Say things that will help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 도울 수 있는 말을 하세요

sentences.original_text: Then, when someone asks you a question
you will know how to reply
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 어떻게 대답할지 알게 될 것입니다
